name: Branch Manager
description:
Create branches of your business, earn money! Made for the 3 hour Game Jam called Trijam, with the theme Branching Out. This was our first attempt at a jam with such a short time span, so while it may not look like much we learnt a lot about how to scope for such a short time.

Made by:

  • Kyle Hillier
  • Keanen Collins
  • Nico Formaggio
